extensionDescription.message: Eine Browsererweiterung speziell für Bibliotheken mit RFID-Diebstahlsicherungsanlagen der Firma Feig. Zeigt aktuelle Alarme und Besucherzahlen (falls verfügbar) und bietet die Möglichkeit Gates laut/stumm zu schalten.

notificationContent.description: Tells the user which item triggered an alarm.

menuAlarmContent.description: Tells the user which item triggered an alarm.

available.description: Notification message if item is available.

borrowed.description: Notification message if item is borrowed.

noAlarms.description: Message in alarm list displayed if no alarms found.

alarmOn.description: Title of the toolbar button if gate sound is on.

alarmOff.description: Title of the toolbar button if gate sound is off.

alarmMixed.description: Title of the toolbar button if  sound of one of the gates is off.

unknown.description: Title of toolbar button if there is no connection to the Websocket.

connectButton.description: Title of the reconnect button in menu.

emptyListButton.description: Title of the reconnect button in menu.

externalButton.description: Title of the external button in menu.

settingsButton.description: Title of the settins button in menu.

buttonTurnOnSound.description: Title of the sound button in menu.

buttonTurnOffSound.description: Title of the sound button in menu.

gateNotConnected.description: Title of the sound button in list when gate is not connected

buttonTurnOnSoundAll.description: Title of the sound button in menu.

buttonTurnOffSoundAll.description: Title of the sound button in menu.

offline.description: Title of toolbar button when application is offline.

noGates.description: Browser action if no gate was configured
